#text=I was taking a day trip to another city not too far away .
#text=I decided to take my trip by train .
#text=I looked up a timetable for trains leaving my city and going to the new city , and arrived at the station not too long before my train was due to arrive .
#text=I went to the ticket booth and bought my ticket .
#text=Then I walked to the platform to wait for my train to arrive .
#text=The platform was a little high in the air , and I could see the tracks on the ground below .
#text=Looking across the tracks , there was a similar platform on the other side for trains coming from the other direction .
#text=I heard some clatter and a loud whistle , and saw that my train was heading toward my platform .
#text=I stood behind a line painted on the floor of the platform , as it kept me a safe distance from the arriving train .
#text=Finally , it stopped , and the doors opened up .
#text=I walked on board and found a seat next to a window .
#text=When everyone was on board , the doors closed and the train whistled again to let everyone know that it was leaving .
#text=It was very roomy on the train and I was able to walk up and down the aisle while the train was moving .
#text=Finally , it arrived at my destination and I got off .
#text=Riding the train was an easy and pleasant experience .
